author: Reuters Editorial
title: UK police say no sign blast in English city was linked to terrorism
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - British police said on Sunday there was no immediate indication that an explosion that destroyed a convenience store and a home in the central English city of Leicester was linked to terrorism.
“Incident will be the subject of a joint investigation with the fire service,” the local police force said on Twitter. “At this stage there is no indication this is terrorist related.”
Reporting By Andrew MacAskill; Editing by William Schomberg
